attributes.action: enact into Law a statutory Table Tennis Hour in all schools, colleges, workplaces and public buildings of the UK at 4pm every working day.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In order to combat obesity in the UK, everyone in Britain will, by law, play table tennis for an hour every week day at 4pm.

Table tennis has many advantages as a form of national exercise in the UK: the balls are cheap, the game can be played indoors during the winter, and it doesn't need as much space as basketball.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
